WorkItem.Summary: public static SvgDocument Open(XmlDocument document) returns null

Comments.Message: I'd probably recommend you use UTF8Encoding though. Might prevent some problems in the future and its a good direction to end toward.

- Fixed in changeset #23564.

Thanks for the help with this one guys.

I'd like to say though, that using an XmlDocument isn't recommended if you're concerned with performance. The SVG parser is optimised for reading straight from XML. If an XmlDocument is used there are two issues:

1) The XmlDocument has already parsed the XML and so the Svg library isn't going to parse it again (i.e. Parsing already parsed XML).
2) XmlDocument is pretty slow. I'm not saying the SVG implementation is faster but it only parses what it understands rather than everything.
